questions.quote: Uh, I gotta apologize for Kara's coffee. Y'know, I feel sorry for it if it ever got in a fight, it's not strong enough to defend itself. Did you hear what I said Bing?
Well, I finally took your advice and asked him what was going on.
Well yeah, in that it's not being used and I... have it to spare.
Sorry to bother you again, but could you pass my pamphlets back? Thank you.
Hey! Mine was by accident! All right, the boiler explodes and destroys the hotel, and kills the dad.
Mum, please!I know you love your new lips, but I can barely understand you! Would you, please, just let me say goodnight to my daughter? TV: "And number 29! Here we go! The Powerball is 7"
Oh, please, honey, listen, if I can do it, anybody can. You just start with half a dozen European cities, throw in thirty euphemisms for male genitalia, and bam! You have got yourself a book.
Oh well, all right...um, no offense, but you were kind of rude.
No! Umm well, some people say that Oysters are an aphrodisiac.
That's okay, this is more important than fruit on my ceiling! You broke up?!
